/* com.innobiz.orange.web.wf.dao.WfFormBDao.selectWfFormB */
SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
* FROM (SELECT N.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT
T.FORM_NO, T.COMP_ID, T.FORM_ID, T.GRP_ID, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM WF_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) AS FORM_NM, T.FORM_DESC, T.RESC_ID, T.USE_YN, T.FORM_TYP, T.REG_YN, T.LST_YN, T.MD_TYP_CD, T.ALL_COMP_YN, T.LST_TYP_CD, T.GEN_ID, T.STAT_CD, T.DEPLOY_DT, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.REGR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'ko')) REGR_NM, T.REGR_UID, T.REG_DT, T.MODR_UID, T.MOD_DT,
FROM WF_FORM_B T
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.REG_DT DESC
) N WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
